name: Stay Big
description: You're trapped in a world and you're shrinking! To prevent yourself from shrinking to death, you'll need Size Stars. They'll help you grow you and will help you from shrinking. But shrinking isn't the only thing you should avoid. There are missiles, too and while growing, the ground can collapse. To protect yourself, you'll need to be bigger than the size of 20 pixels. To help you track your size, there is a blue bar to show how big/small you are. If you're bigger than 20 pixels, you can launch 2 chunks of yourself at the direction of left and right. These chunks will destroy the missiles. To escape, you'll need 10000 Size Stars. That seems a lot, but don't worry; the game will save your Size Stars until you leave the game. Once you have enough, there'll be a white door that lets you escape. What will happen next? You'll find out at the end. Have fun!
